effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's [Speed]{mechanic:speed} by six [stages]{mechanic:stage}.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} by six [stages]{mechanic:stage} in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
素早さを　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta incredibilmente la Velocità di un
Pokémon in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce
se il Pokémon è sostituito.

Hebt den Initiative-Wert eines Pokémon im Kampf
enorm an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem Austausch
des Pokémon.

Augmente fortement la Vitesse pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon
se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 스피드를
엄청나게 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
すばやさを　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

It raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte fortement la Vitesse pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
